## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Documentation

- [ ] My changes include updated documentation
- [ ] All new/modified documentation follows style guidelines
- [ ] Code examples are correct and tested
- [ ] Links are valid and working
- [ ] No spelling or grammar errors

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows the QAQC standards defined in this framework
- [ ] Comments are added for complex sections
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] Security best practices are followed
- [ ] Examples include both vulnerable and secure versions (where applicable)

### Git

- [ ] My commits follow the [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) specification
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] Branch is up to date with the base branch
- [ ] No merge conflicts

### Review

- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my changes
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] I have checked that my changes don't duplicate existing content
- [ ] I have tested that automated checks pass locally
